name: Zeratul
title: Dark Prelate
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Singularity Spike
abilities.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 228 damage after 1 second and slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport to the target location. Using this Ability does not break cloak.

heroics.name: Void Prison
heroics.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

heroics.name: Shadow Assault
heroics.description: Basic Attacks cause Zeratul to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.
